TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Xml extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 顯示未格式化，或使用可延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 的 XML 文件。

span.span: Displays an XML document without formatting or using Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [指定 XML 資料Specifying XML Data](#specifying_xml_data) - [指定的 XSL 轉換Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來顯示未格式化，或使用 XSL 轉換的 XML 文件的內容。Use the control to display the contents of an XML document without formatting or using XSL Transformations. ## 指定 XML 資料Specifying XML Data 設定其中三個屬性來指定要顯示的 XML 文件。The XML document to display is specified by setting one of three properties. 這三個屬性都代表不同類型的 XML 文件可顯示。These three properties represent the different types of XML documents that can be displayed. 您可以顯示，XML 字串或藉由設定適當的屬性的 XML 檔案。You can display a , an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 下表列出用於指定 XML 文件的屬性。The following table lists the properties for specifying the XML document. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||設定 XML 文件使用物件。Sets the XML document using a object. **警告：** 這個屬性已經過時。**Warning:** This property is obsolete. 使用其中一個其他屬性列在此區段可設定的 XML 內容控制項。Use one of the other properties listed in this section to set the XML content for the control.| ||設定使用字串的 XML 文件。Sets the XML document using a string. **注意：** 設定這個屬性是常用以宣告方式放置文字的開頭和結尾之間``標記控制項。**Note:** This property is commonly set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control.| ||設定使用檔案的 XML 文件。Sets the XML document using a file.| > [!NOTE] > 至少其中一個 XML 文件屬性必須設定為顯示 XML 文件。At least one of the XML document properties must be set to display an XML document. 如果設定多個 XML 文件屬性時，會顯示最後一個屬性集合中所參考的 XML 文件。If more than one XML document property is set, the XML document referenced in the last property set is displayed. 其他屬性中的文件會被忽略。The documents in the other properties are ignored. ## 指定的 XSL 轉換Specifying an XSL Transformation 您可以選擇性地指定格式化 XML 文件之前它會寫入至輸出資料流，藉由設定兩個屬性的其中一個, XSL 轉換 (XSLT) 樣式表。You can optionally specify an XSL Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream by setting one of two properties. 兩個屬性都代表不同類型的 XSL 轉換樣式表，可以用來格式化 XML 文件。The two properties represent the different types of XSL Transformation style sheets that can be used to format the XML document. 您可以格式化 XML 文件物件，或使用 XSL 轉換樣式表檔案設定適當的屬性。You can format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file by setting the appropriate property. 如果未不指定任何 XSL 轉換樣式表，則 XML 文件會使用預設的格式來顯示。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 下表列出的屬性指定的 XSL 轉換樣式表。The following table lists the properties for specifying an XSL Transformation style sheet. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||使用指定的 XML 文件格式化物件。Formats the XML document using the specified object. **注意：** 使用物件需要`Full Trust`權限。**Note:** Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions.| ||使用指定的 XSL 轉換樣式表檔案的 XML 文件格式化。Formats the XML document using the specified XSL Transformation style sheet file.| > [!NOTE] > XSL 轉換樣式表是選擇性的。The XSL Transformation style sheet is optional. 您不需要設定或屬性。You do not need to set the or the property. 如果這兩個 XSL 轉換樣式表屬性已設定，最後一個屬性設定會決定哪一個 XSL 轉換樣式表用來格式化 XML 文件。If both XSL Transformation style sheet properties are set, the last property set determines which XSL Transformation style sheet is used to format the XML document. 會忽略其他屬性。The other property is ignored. 類別也會提供屬性，可讓您有選擇性引數提供的 XSL 轉換樣式表。The class also provides the property, which enables you to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 引數可以是 XSL 轉換 (XSLT) 參數或擴充物件。The arguments can be either XSL Transformations (XSLT) parameters or extension objects. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和範例 XML 檔案和 XSL 轉換樣式表的物件。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. XML 控制項接著會使用物件來顯示 XML 文件。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性已經過時。The property is obsolete. 若要指定的 XML，將會顯示在控制，請使用屬性或屬性。To specify the XML that will be displayed in the control, use the property or the property. 如需有關這些替代方案的詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀控制項。For more information about these alternatives, see the class overview for the control. 若要顯示在 XML 文件三種方式之一指定控制項。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 您可以指定物件、 XML 字串或藉由設定適當的屬性的 XML 檔案。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 屬性用來指定（代表 XML 文件） 來顯示控制項中。The property is used to specify a (representing an XML document) to display in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和範例 XML 檔案和 XSL 轉換樣式表的物件。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. XML 控制項接著會使用物件來顯示 XML 文件。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DocumentContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 設定字串，包含顯示於 控制項中的 XML 文件。

span.span: Sets a string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

value.span: 字串，包含顯示於 控制項中的 XML 文件。

span.span: A string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示在 XML 文件三種方式之一指定控制項。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 您可以指定物件、 XML 字串或藉由設定適當的屬性的 XML 檔案。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 屬性用來指定要在控制項中顯示的 XML 字串 （代表 XML 文件）。The property is used to specify an XML string (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 屬性通常不是以程式設計方式設定，或設定控制項的屬性。The property is not typically programmatically set, or set as an attribute of the control. 相反地，XML 字串通常設定以宣告方式加上文字的開頭和結尾之間``控制項的標記。Instead, the XML string is usually set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control. > [!NOTE] > 雖然屬性會同時包含`get`並`set`存取子，只有`set`存取子是很有用。Although the property contains both `get` and `set` accessors, only the `set` accessor is useful. 如果您使用`get`存取子，會傳回。If you use the `get` accessor, is returned.

related.span: XML Web 伺服器控制項概觀

member this.DocumentSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 控制項中的 XML 文件的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an XML document to display in the control.

value.span: XML 文件的路徑，顯示於 控制項中。

span.span: The path to an XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示在 XML 文件三種方式之一指定控制項。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 您可以指定物件、 XML 字串或藉由設定適當的屬性的 XML 檔案。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 屬性用來指定要在控制項中顯示的 XML 檔案 （代表 XML 文件） 的路徑。The property is used to specify the path to an XML file (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 您可以使用相對或絕對路徑。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相對路徑與相關位置的 Web Form 網頁或使用者控制項檔案的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不更新程式碼中的檔案的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 絕對路徑會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要更新程式碼。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示 XML 文件使用 XSL 轉換控制項。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/CS/xmlcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/VB/xmlcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 XML 文件寫入至輸出資料流之前，取得或設定格式化 XML 文件的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

value.span: ，在寫入至輸出資料流之前將 XML 文件格式化。

span.span: The that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用控制項來顯示 XML 文件，您可以選擇性地指定格式化 XML 文件之前它會寫入至輸出資料流中有兩種, 可延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 樣式表。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document, before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 您可以格式化 XML 文件使用物件或 XSL 轉換樣式表檔案。You can format the XML document with either a object or an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果未不指定任何 XSL 轉換文件，XML 文件會使用預設的格式來顯示。If no XSL Transform document is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 屬性用來指定物件 （代表 XSL 轉換的文件），用來格式化 XML 文件之前它會寫入至輸出資料流。The property is used to specify a object (representing an XSL Transform document) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. > [!NOTE] > 使用物件需要`Full Trust`權限。Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和範例 XML 檔案和 XSL 轉換樣式表的物件。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. XML 控制項接著會使用物件來顯示 XML 文件。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: XML Web 伺服器控制項概觀

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，包含傳遞給樣式表並用於延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 的選擇性引數清單。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).

value.span: ，包含傳遞給樣式表並用於延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 的選擇性引數清單。

span.span: A that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the XSL Transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性提供 XSL 轉換樣式表有選擇性引數。Use the property to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 引數可以是 XSLT 參數或擴充物件。The arguments can be either XSLT parameters or extension objects. 如需使用詳細資訊類別，請參閱[樣式表參數和擴充物件的 XsltArgumentList](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects.md)。For more information about using the class, see [XsltArgumentList for Style Sheet Parameters and Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects.md).

related.span: 樣式表參數和擴充物件的 XsltArgumentList

span.span: XsltArgumentList For Style Sheet Parameters and Extension Objects

related.span: XML Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: XML Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TransformSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TransformSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 樣式表的路徑，該樣式表會在 XML 文件寫入至輸出資料流之前將文件格式化。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

value.span: XSL 轉換樣式表的路徑，該樣式表在 XML 文件寫入至輸出資料流之前將文件格式化。

span.span: The path to an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用控制項來顯示 XML 文件，您可以選擇性地指定格式化 XML 文件之前它會寫入至輸出資料流中有兩種, XSL 轉換樣式表。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 您可以格式化 XML 文件物件，或使用 XSL 轉換樣式表檔案。You can either format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果未不指定任何 XSL 轉換樣式表，則 XML 文件會使用預設的格式來顯示。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 屬性用來指定用來格式化 XML 文件寫入至輸出資料流之前 （代表 XSL 轉換樣式表） XSL 轉換樣式表檔案的路徑。The property is used to specify the path to an XSL Transformation style sheet file (representing an XSL Transformation style sheet) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. 您可以使用相對或絕對路徑。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相對路徑與相關位置的 Web Form 網頁或使用者控制項檔案的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不更新程式碼中的檔案的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 絕對路徑會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要更新程式碼。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示 XML 文件使用 XSL 轉換控制項。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/CS/xmlcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/VB/xmlcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: XML Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: XML Web Server Control Overview

summary.span: 取得或設定游標模型，用於巡覽和編輯與 控制項關聯的 XML 資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a cursor model for navigating and editing the XML data associated with the control.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來建立關聯物件控制項。This property can be used to associate an object with the control. 實作的類別，從建立物件介面，例如和類別。An object is created from a class that implements the interface, such as the and classes. 所建立的物件物件是唯讀的並所建立的物件可以編輯的物件。 objects created by objects are read-only, and objects created by objects can be edited. 物件的唯讀或可編輯狀態用來決定屬性類別。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class.

related.span: XML Web 伺服器控制項概觀

span.span: XML Web Server Control Overview
